entry.title: FasterXML jackson-databind 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FasterXML jackson-databind 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-9547

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x 在2.9.10.4之前的版本中，处理序列化小工具和类型交互时存在漏洞，与com.ibatis.sqlmap.engine.transaction.jta.JtaTransactionConfig（即ibatis-sqlmap）相关。当启用多态类型处理（@JsonTypeInfo with use=JsonTypeInfo.Id.CLASS）时，此漏洞允许攻击者通过反序列化不受信任的数据执行任意代码。成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以通过反序列化恶意的JSON负载在受影响的系统上执行任意代码。

产品厂商： fasterxml

产品名称： jackson-databind

影响版本： 2.x < 2.9.10.4

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/83cce872715b7eba673bc6210787257838c9ee2b/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-9547.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FasterXML jackson-databind 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: FasterXML jackson-databind JtaTransactionConfig 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FasterXML jackson-databind JtaTransactionConfig 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-9547

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x在2.9.10.4之前的版本中，处理序列化小工具和类型交互时存在漏洞，与com.ibatis.sqlmap.engine.transaction.jta.JtaTransactionConfig（即ibatis-sqlmap）相关。

产品厂商： FasterXML

产品名称： jackson-databind

影响版本： 2.x < 2.9.10.4

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12488

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.4 mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing, related to com.ibatis.sqlmap.engine.transaction.jta.JtaTransactionConfig (aka ibatis-sqlmap).

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2020-9547

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: ISPConfig language_editphp PHP代码注入
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ISPConfig language_edit.php PHP代码注入

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-46818

漏洞类型： 代码注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： ISPConfig的language_edit.php文件中存在PHP代码注入漏洞。当admin_allow_langedit设置启用时，经过身份验证的管理员可以通过语言编辑器界面注入任意PHP代码。该模块会自动检查所需的admin_allow_langedit权限是否启用，并尝试在禁用时启用它（需要具有系统配置访问权限的管理员凭据）。漏洞利用通过将PHP有效负载注入到语言文件中，然后在访问该文件时执行。有效负载使用PHP的file_put_contents函数进行base64编码和写入。

产品厂商： ISPConfig

产品名称： ISPConfig

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/e77abd9bbc57ac9880da3de768ac1d76e2a14d70/modules%2Fexploits%2Flinux%2Fhttp%2Fispconfig_lang_edit_php_code_injection.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ISPConfig language_edit.php PHP代码注入

entry.title: Moodle 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Moodle 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-43425

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Moodle允许经过认证的教师级别用户通过测验编辑器界面上传恶意的计算问题。由于对计算问题中的数学负载的不当清理，导致通过数据集向导的命令注入，从而允许远程代码执行（RCE）。

产品厂商： Moodle

产品名称： Moodle

来源： https://github.com/aninfosec/CVE-2024-43425-Poc

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • exploit.py

来源概述

CVE-2024-43425-Poc

CVE Overview
CVE ID: CVE-2024-43425

Description: Moodle allows an authenticated teacher-level user to upload a malicious calculated question via the quiz editor interface.
Impact: Remote Code Execution (RCE)
Cause: Improper sanitization of mathematical payloads inside calculated questions, which leads to command injection through the dataset wizard.

##Requirements:

Valid login credentials
Access to quiz editing interface (usually a teacher or admin role)
Known cmid (quiz module ID) and courseid

##This script performs a 5-step attack:

StepDescription
1️Fetch login token (logintoken)
2️Log in and establish a valid MoodleSession
3️Extract sesskey, ctxid, and category from the quiz edit page
4️Upload a specially crafted calculated question with an RCE payload
5️Trigger the payload through the dataset wizard page

##Usage Instructions

Requirements:
Python 3
Python libraries: requests, bs4 (BeautifulSoup)

##Payload used:

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Moodle 远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: Brother MFC-L9570CDW 信息泄露漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Brother MFC-L9570CDW 信息泄露漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-51977

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 未经认证的攻击者可以访问HTTP服务（TCP端口80）、HTTPS服务（TCP端口443）或IPP服务（TCP端口631），从而从易受攻击的设备中泄露多段敏感信息。通过GET请求访问URI路径/etc/mnt_info.csv，无需认证。返回的结果是一个逗号分隔值（CSV）信息表。泄露的信息包括设备的型号、固件版本、IP地址和序列号。

产品厂商： Brother

产品名称： MFC-L9570CDW

搜索语法： html:”MFC-L9570CDW”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/d0b157d078cffbdf7a18b498b8dba3a01ef4b29e/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-51977.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Brother MFC-L9570CDW 信息泄露漏洞

entry.title: The PT Project Notebooks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation due to
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjx8-42xr-xg34

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-5304

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/project-notebooks/tags/1.1.3/includes/structure/admin/pto_admin_settings.php#L233

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/project-notebooks/tags/1.1.3/includes/structure/admin/pto_admin_settings.php#L36

  • https://wordpress.org/plugins/project-notebooks/#developers

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/552ec9fc-5bff-4bee-be04-39892c89cd59?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjx8-42xr-xg34

描述：

The PT Project Notebooks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation due to missing authorization in the wpnb_pto_new_users_add() function in versions 1.0.0 through 1.1.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to elevate their privileges to that of an administrator.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjx8-42xr-xg34

entry.title: Notepad++ 本地权限提升漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Notepad++ 本地权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49144

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-49144是Notepad++安装程序中的一个本地权限提升漏洞。攻击者可以利用此漏洞在受影响的系统上提升权限。此PoC旨在为安全研究人员提供一个实际的测试环境，以便更好地理解和利用此漏洞。

产品厂商： Notepad++

产品名称： Notepad++

来源： https://github.com/65-75-65-83-72/CVE-2025-49144_PoC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • misc
  • regsvr32_loader.c

来源概述

CVE-2025-49144 PoC: A Resource for Security Researchers 🔍

Overview

This repository contains a proof of concept (PoC) for CVE-2025-49144. It serves as a resource for security researchers who wish to explore this vulnerability. The PoC aims to provide a hands-on experience in testing and understanding the implications of the vulnerability in various environments.

Table of Contents

  • Getting Started
  • Installation
  • Usage
  • Contributing
  • License
  • Contact

Getting Started

To get started with the CVE-2025-49144 PoC, you can download the latest release from the Releases section. Download the file, and execute it in a suitable environment.

Installation

Prerequisites

Before running the PoC, ensure you have the following:

  • Kali Linux: This PoC is tested on Kali Linux. Make sure you have it installed.
  • Notepad++: The PoC interacts with Notepad++. Ensure you have it installed on your Windows system.

Steps to Install

  1. Clone the Repository: Use the following command to clone the repository to your local machine.

  2. Navigate to the Directory: Change into the directory where the repository is cloned.

  3. Download the Release: Visit the Releases section to download the required files.

  4. Execute the PoC: After downloading, execute the PoC file in your terminal.

Usage

After installation, you can run the PoC to test for the vulnerability. Follow these steps:

  1. Open a Terminal: Launch a terminal in Kali Linux.

  2. Run the PoC: Execute the command to run the PoC.

  3. Monitor the Output: Observe the terminal output for any indications of vulnerability exploitation.

  4. Test Different Scenarios: Modify the input parameters to explore various attack vectors.

Topics Covered

This repository focuses on several important topics in cybersecurity:

  • CVE-2025-49144: Understanding the specifics of this vulnerability.
  • Cybersecurity Education: Learning how to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities.
  • Kali Linux: Utilizing this platform for penetration testing.
  • Notepad++: Exploring the interaction with this popular text editor.
  • Windows: Testing the PoC in a Windows environment.

Contributing

Contributions are welcome! If you wish to contribute to this project, please follow these steps:

  1. Fork the Repository: Click the “Fork” button on the top right of the page.

  2. Create a Branch: Use a descriptive name for your branch.

  3. Make Changes: Implement your changes in the code.

  4. Commit Your Changes: Commit your changes with a clear message.

  5. Push to the Branch: Push your changes to your forked repository.

  6. Create a Pull Request: Go to the original repository and create a pull request.

License

This project is licensed under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for details.

Contact

For any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out:

  • Email: your-email@example.com
  • GitHub: Your GitHub Profile

Acknowledgments

Special thanks to the cybersecurity community for their continuous efforts in making the digital world safer.

Additional Resources

For further reading and resources on CVE-2025-49144 and related topics, consider the following links:

  • CVE Details
  • Kali Linux Documentation
  • Notepad++ Documentation

Feel free to explore these resources to enhance your understanding of cybersecurity practices and vulnerabilities.

Explore More

Stay updated with the latest developments in cybersecurity. You can follow various blogs, forums, and newsletters that focus on vulnerabilities and exploits.

Final Notes

Testing and understanding vulnerabilities is crucial for improving security measures. This PoC aims to provide a foundational understanding of CVE-2025-49144. Engage with the community, share your findings, and contribute to making software safer for everyone.

For further exploration, visit the Releases section to download the latest version of the PoC.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

entry.title: Brother 信息泄露漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Brother 信息泄露漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-51977

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 未经认证的攻击者可以访问HTTP服务（TCP端口80）、HTTPS服务（TCP端口443）或IPP服务（TCP端口631），从易受攻击的设备中泄露多段敏感信息。通过GET请求可以访问URI路径/etc/mnt_info.csv，且无需认证。返回的结果是一个逗号分隔值（CSV）信息表。泄露的信息包括设备的型号、固件版本、IP地址和序列号。

产品厂商： Brother

产品名称： Brother Printer

搜索语法： title:”Brother” html:”/common/js/lcddisplay.js” location:”/general/status.html” title:”DocuPrint”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/983cce67fe5ba45b4a3f26dcf0fcad69d2a388b5/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-51977.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

漏洞名称： Brother Printers 默认管理员密码认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-51978

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 通过泄露目标设备的序列号，远程攻击者可以生成目标设备的默认管理员密码。目标设备可能通过未经认证的HTTP、HTTPS、IPP、SNMP或PJL请求泄露其序列号。

产品厂商： Brother

产品名称： Brother Printers

搜索语法： app=”brother-Printer”

entry.title: QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-7194

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 存在外部文件名或路径控制漏洞，由于验证不足，远程攻击者可以访问或修改系统文件，利用此漏洞需要远程网络访问。

产品厂商： QNAP

产品名称： QNAP Photo Station

搜索语法： content-length: 580 “http server 1.0”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12254

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

QNAP Photo Station contains an external control of file name or path caused by insufficient validation, letting remote attackers access or modify system files, exploit requires remote network access.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157857/QNAP-QTS-And-Photo-Station-6.0.3-Remote-Command-Execution.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: content-length: 580 "http server 1.0"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞
